argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | dvmptid.1 | |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) |
| 2 |  | dvmptc.2 | |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_cnfldtopon | |- ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) e. ( TopOn ` CC ) |
| 5 |  | #P_toponmax | |- ( ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) e. ( TopOn ` CC ) -> CC e. ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_mp1i | |- ( ph -> CC e. ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_recnprss | |- ( S e. { RR , CC } -> S C_ CC ) |
| 8 | 1, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> S C_ CC ) |
| 9 |  | #P_df-ss | |- ( S C_ CC <-> ( S i^i CC ) = S ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_sylib | |- ( ph -> ( S i^i CC ) = S ) |
| 11 | 2 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. CC ) -> A e. CC ) |
| 12 |  | #P_0cnd | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. CC ) -> 0 e. CC ) |
| 13 |  | #P_dvconst | |- ( A e. CC -> ( CC _D ( CC X. { A } ) ) = ( CC X. { 0 } ) ) |
| 14 | 2, 13 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( CC _D ( CC X. { A } ) ) = ( CC X. { 0 } ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_fconstmpt | |- ( CC X. { A } ) = ( x e. CC |-> A ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_oveq2i | |- ( CC _D ( CC X. { A } ) ) = ( CC _D ( x e. CC |-> A ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_fconstmpt | |- ( CC X. { 0 } ) = ( x e. CC |-> 0 ) |
| 18 | 14, 16, 17 | #P_3eqtr3g | |- ( ph -> ( CC _D ( x e. CC |-> A ) ) = ( x e. CC |-> 0 ) ) |
| 19 | 3, 1, 6, 10, 11, 12, 18 | #P_dvmptres3 | |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( x e. S |-> A ) ) = ( x e. S |-> 0 ) ) |
